timeline.bodyText: The comment for this test says "Verify that connection factory "eis/cf" has loginTimeout=100"  So is loginTimeout=100 the default?
timeline.author: gjwatts

replies.bodyText:
This is not a liberty default.  Instead it is set in the ra.xml config file here:

  
    
      open-liberty/dev/com.ibm.ws.jca_fat_dynamicConfig/test-resourceadapters/DynamicConfigRA/resources/META-INF/ra.xml
    
    
        Lines 24 to 26
      in
      4965bce
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <config-property-name>loginTimeout</config-property-name>  
        

        
          
           <config-property-type>java.lang.Integer</config-property-type> 
        

        
          
           <config-property-value>100</config-property-value>
replies.author: KyleAure
